script.dialog: Sentinel?
|C3|Reboot initiated    .    .    .
Is that a good thing?
|shake|Sentinel?
This Unit should not have attacked you.
Don't scare me like that.
This Unit expresses extreme levels of remorse.
This Unit will now put herself in the trash folder where she belongs.
|shake|Hey!|norm||!||L|Don't talk like that!
Don't make me go back in there and do some rewiring.
This Unit does not understand.|!||L|She has only insulted herself, and yet, this has offended you somehow.
How else am I supposed to feel?|!||L|You just insulted my friend!
It hurts me to hear you talk like that about yourself.
|C3|Processing    .    .    .
This Unit had not considered the possibility that a Zaraden would care about the feelings of a Zaramech unit.
This Unit does not want to upset you.
I'm not upset.|L||!|Just try to be kind to yourself, okay?
This request will be implemented immediately.
This Unit has a request for you as well.
Oh, what is it?
This Unit would like you to play a game with her.
It is a simple game.|L||!|This Unit will ask questions and you will answer them.
This Unit derives immense satisfaction from testing the knowledge of others.
Sure thing, Sentinel!
The raw elation that This Unit is experiencing could power the nearest tower for a hundred years.
|wave|That's what I love to hear.
This Unit will now prepare questions for you.
The amount of time that this will take cannot be predicted.
This Unit will come back to find you later today.
Wait, before you go!
|wave|I love you!
It is impossible to calculate the value of this adoration within a reasonable time frame.
